title: Comment on Watch: U2 performs “Ordinary Love” at 2014 Academy Awards by HOW TO START A MUSIC BLOG | Get Link Youtube
text:
Reddit 
The 2014 Academy Awards took place in Los Angeles on Sunday night. Several of the artists nominated in the Best Song category performed during the ceremony, including U2 . Bono and Co. unfurled a rendition of “Ordinary Love”, their contribution to Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom . Catch the replay below. 
The gala also featured performances by Yeah Yeah Yeahs frontwoman Karen O with Vampire Weekend’s Ezra Koenig and Pharrell Williams. Replay those performances here . Artists
